    • getComparatorMap

      protected Map<String,​Comparator<Message>> getComparatorMap()
      Description copied from class: EntityService
      Get comparators map for entity type. Comparators map is a (key, value) map, where:
      • key is the name of a property belonging to the given entity type
      • value is a comparator class, under the comparators subpackage
        • , that compares according to that property
      Specified by:
      getComparatorMap in class EntityService<Message>
      Returns:
      comparators map

    • getFilterMap

      protected Map<String,​Filter<Message,​?>> getFilterMap()
      Description copied from class: EntityService
      Get filters map for entity type. Filters map is a (key, value) map, where:
      • key is the name of a property belonging to the given entity type
      • value is a filter class, under the filters subpackage
        • , that filters according to that property
      Specified by:
      getFilterMap in class EntityService<Message>
      Returns:
      filters map

    • get

      public Message get​(User u, String code)
      Gets single message only if a given user has read permission on it
      Parameters:
      u - given user
      code - message's code
      Returns:
      message object, if no errors occur
      Throws:
      NoSuchElementException - if message doesn't exist or user hasn't got permission on it
